Based on the screenshot, the camera interface is now open, and the shutter button (UI element 18) is visible. To complete the task, the user needs to click the shutter button to take a picture, and then click the cross icon (discard) to discard the picture. Since the screenshot only shows the camera interface, and the user has not yet discarded the picture, the goal is not yet achieved.
